english: The enemy were compelled to lay down their arms ..
He dragged out the log and laid it down .
chinese: 他把那根木头拖出来放下。

english: The whole town had dropped its business .
chinese: 全城的人都放下工作不做。

english: Bill laid down the egg he was peeling .
chinese: 比尔放下手里正在剥的鸡蛋。

english: With a grimace, he dropped the spoon .
chinese: 他做了个鬼脸，放下了汤匙。
放下造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: Put down that knife before you hurt somebody !
chinese: 把那刀子放下，以免伤人！

english: Would you like me to take down your hair ?
chinese: 你要不要我把你的头发放下来？

english: He dropped the reins and heaved on the brake .
chinese: 他放下缰绳，猛地拉住车闸。

english: He stops his work and puts down his hammer .
chinese: 他停下手里的活儿，放下榔头。

english: He put down a newspaper he had been glancing at .
chinese: 他把正在浏览的报纸放下。
我放下了心，朝着他的前面望去。

english: He will not lay it down until it is finished .
chinese: 他没干完的事决不会放下不干。
把一切工作都放下，到这里来！

english: Take off your kit and sit down .
chinese: 把你的行李放下来，坐一坐。

english: The sunshine wiled me from my work .
chinese: 阳光引诱我放下了工作。
